item.description:
This meeting is back at my house which is the Idle Dog in Maynard. Come see the new floor! At last! There will probably be something to eat and something warm to drink. After all, we live in apple country.

Hope to see a bunch of you there.

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs October Meetup
